name: Pumpkin Lord
description:
Defend your farm from the ravenous rats and sacrifice the Golden Pumpkin to become the greatest Pumpkin Lord!

Old Dry Witch Games’ submission for the Spooktober Jam 2021, our first game jam! 
After seven days of hard work, we're proud to present you Pumpkin Lord!
Thanks for playing and feel free to comment any feedback!

How to play

Keyboard:
Use the arrow keys to move, 'space' to pick up/throw items, 'X' to attack and 'C' to perform a sacrifice when next to the cauldron. Enter and leave the sacrifice list with 'ESC'.

Controller:
Use the left stick to move, 'A' (south button) to pick up/throw items, 'B' (east button) to attack and 'Y' (north button) to perform a sacrifice when next to the cauldron. Enter and leave the sacrifice list with 'start'.
